hat she had been killed, the first day she came up as only missing, I calle=
d it in and the cop heard it, and hoped it was only people talking about it=

guy that killed her, and where they would find her body, and sure enough it=

es, I do have all those files intact here on my pc. Thank God, for Frank S.=

und, he has a wonderful gift there, and no one can take it away. sf
